txt.en: Strange and unnatural ice formations dot the landscape of the Withered Heath. They seem to have been made by a cold-drake or a dragon. Destroying the structures should lessen the impact of dragonkind in the Grey Mountains.
Strange and unnatural ice formations dot the landscape of the Withered Heath.
You should destroy any unnatural ice formations that you find on the Withered Heath.
You have successfully destroyed much of the unnatural ice on the Withered Heath. The Zh√©lruka will surely be thankful of your efforts.
